alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; DeKalb; Fayette; Gwinnett; Henry; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 8:57AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Rockdale, DeKalb, northern Fayette, southern Gwinnett, northwestern Henry, north central Coweta, south central Fulton and Clayton Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 856 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Belmont to near Madras, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, Peachtree City, East Point, Stockbridge, Union City, Forest Park, Snellville, Riverdale, College Park, Fairburn, Lilburn, Loganville, Clarkston, Tyrone, Morrow and Hapeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Coweta; DeKalb; Fayette; Gwinnett; Henry; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton
